name: ChatGPT Tic-Tac-Toe
description:
WRITTEN BY CHATGPT:
Introducing Tic-Tac-Toe, the classic game of strategy and wits brought to life by ChatGPT! In this game, players take turns placing their markers on a 3x3 grid, attempting to get three in a row before their opponent. With simple gameplay and endless possibilities, Tic-Tac-Toe offers endless fun for players of all ages. Try your hand at outsmarting your opponent and emerge victorious in Tic-Tac-Toe!

WRITTEN BY HUMAN CURATOR:
This is a JavaScript/HTML implementation of a Tic Tac Toe game, created by ChatGPT.
This game is best played on a desktop, or by viewing the desktop version of the site from a mobile device.

https://chat.openai.com/chat
